Description: Resin amulet in the form of Imsety; linen adheres to the back.
Curator's comments: M Serpico & R White in C J Eyre (ed.), Proceedings 7th International Congress of Egyptologists (Leuven, 1998), 1043.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
